pullrequest.title: Change train_windows (in minibatch) to sort in reverse, such that the last index will not be greater than 9999

content.raw:
This is the maximum number of windows allowed for GMTK. "Number" is ambiguous in this named constant case because it could refer to an index or a count.

I'd suggest something simpler like `MAX_GMTK_WINDOW_COUNT` if you want to change the number to 10000
or `MAX_GMTK_WINDOW_RANGE_INDEX` if you want to change the number to 9999
content.html:
This is the maximum number of windows allowed for GMTK. "Number" is ambiguous in this named constant case because it could refer to an index or a count.

I'd suggest something simpler like MAX_GMTK_WINDOW_COUNT if you want to change the number to 10000 or MAX_GMTK_WINDOW_RANGE_INDEX if you want to change the number to 9999
